评论概述: Almost perfect in every way but I wasn't aware that the inner part of the dress was glittery...
评论详情: I purchased this dress to wear to a wedding. It fit well, it was very comfortable and extremely flattering on my 5'10", Size 24 frame. I got several compliments while wearing it. It was a little warm though, the stretchy fabric doesn't breathe and we were out in the sun... and I was surprised to find that the dress was glittery (under the sheer over-piece). They do mention it in the description, but frankly I didn't read the description for anything more than the fabric. I'm not a fan of glitter, but if you are, it's even better.

OH MY I was looking long and hard for a dress to wear to my sons wedding.  I needed something that would camouflage my stomach and my rear end.  I am also hippy.  I got this dress first in an size 18 and it was a bit snug so I then got a size 20.  The color was amazing, it camouflage all that did not want seen and it flowed so nice on me.  I received so many compliments.  The temperature wa 99 degrees that day but no humidity and i was comfortable. I did have to steam iron it before wedding since it was in a suit case but other than that I was so impressed especially since I only paid 35 for the dress.  Got to love Amazon

This was a last minute purchase for my mom who was asked to go to a banquet where the attire was purple for the ladies. Found this and fell in love! This dress is exactly as it is described. My mom is 5'0 so the chiffon in the back hung slightly longer, but it wasn't so long it touched the ground. Maybe a 3 inches above her ankle. The color wa a nice rich deep purple and the chiffon covering helps to hide anything you don't want seen. My mom is typically between a 16W/18W. I went with thr 18W and it was a great fit. Not to big or to small, but just right. Would definitely recommend and would order again in a different color. If you're in the fence, buy the dress you won't regret it at all. Oh and she received a lot of compliments!

评论详情: I liked this dress because it was loose fit and the chiffon covered up my spare tire and bra bulges.  I wore it to a formal wedding.  The material was such that no slip was needed. There was a place with air conditioning to cool off , but once the sun went down it was not so uncomfortable

I ordered the dress to wear to my sister's retirement party. The colors were royal blue and gold. The dress was the perfect shade of blue. The fabric was great. The style and fit were fantastic. I am a big girl and the dress looked good on me. As a matter of fact, I had a twin at the party. One of my nieces, who is also a big girl, had on the same dress. And she looked amazing. This dress was worth the money.
